snippet.title: Pixel Noir Teaser
snippet.description:
Step into the world of Pixel Noir and fight your way to the truth.

As a disgraced detective, it's up to YOU to untangle the web of deceit in Pinnacle City. Aid citizens in need, land timed hits, and upgrade your gear to face off gangs and even more sinister things lurking in the shadows.

Will you restore your honor or lose yourself to the abyss? Your move, detective.

#PixelNoir on Steam: https://bit.ly/pixelnoirwishlist

#IndieGame #JRPG #DetectiveGame #turnbasedcombat
